about.description-line-1: Full Stack Web Application Developer and passionate about programming.
about.description-line-2: I consider myself a perfectionist and orderly person, I have a great learning capacity and a logical vision of problems, but above all an enormous desire to grow and train as a programmer and as a person.
about.description-line-3: My greatest ambition is to master all kinds of technologies and be able to face any challenge that comes my way.
